there is a there is a way for any

that I got this insight about seven
years
ago uh when I bought stock in a company
and shortly after I and and the price at
which I bought it kind of by definition
was some sort of discounted present
value of a consensus future flow of cash
in that company after I bought it uh the
company made some
statements reported some results and
essentially the market reassessed the
growth prospects of the company
realizing gosh these guys are going to
get bigger than we thought faster than
we thought and so the price
popped and then I bought stock at that
new price and the company then executed
on that newly foreseen growth trajectory
and the stock price didn't move because
that new growth trajectory already was
discounted into the this higher price
and so it it uh it helped me see that
the only way a company can have its
share price continually outperform the
market is if they keep surprising the
market on the upside oh my gosh there's
even even more growth here than we
thought hey everybody come and look
there's even more growth here than we
thought it's the only way a company's
stock can outperform the market is
through upsides upside
surprises and then I realized that just
as the established companies
systematically underestimate how big
disruptive companies will become wall
Street's methods of financial analysis
systematically
undervalue disruptive companies and how
big they will become and so it's
disruptive companies that are the ones
that keep surprising the market on the
upside oh my gosh there's even more
growth here than we thought and so uh my
son and I just were not wealthy people
but we just decided that we would invest
our family's assets with an idiot simple
algorithm that is if disruptive buy when
they hit the high end of the market
sell and over the subsequent six years
that portfolio generated a compounded
annual return of
36% with no leverage no hedging no
shorting just if disruptive buy when it
hits the high end of the market sell and
that's something that really anybody
with just a average income like me can
actually profit quite handsomely by it
